<a id="SpriteFrames"></a>

# SpriteFrames

**Inherits:** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Sprite frame library for AnimatedSprite2D and AnimatedSprite3D.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Sprite frame library for an [AnimatedSprite2D](AnimatedSprite2D.md) or [AnimatedSprite3D](AnimatedSprite3D.md) node. Contains frames and animation data for playback.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="SpriteFrames_method_add_animation"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **add_animation**\ (\ anim\: [StringName](StringName.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#SpriteFrames_method_add_animation)

Adds a new `anim` animation to the library.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SpriteFrames_method_add_frame"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **add_frame**\ (\ anim\: [StringName](StringName.md), texture\: [Texture2D](Texture2D.md), duration\: [float](float.md) = 1.0, at_position\: [int](int.md) = -1\ ) [ðŸ”—](#SpriteFrames_method_add_frame)

Adds a frame to the `anim` animation. If `at_position` is ``-1``, the frame will be added to the end of the animation. `duration` specifies the relative duration, see [get_frame_duration()](SpriteFrames.md#SpriteFrames_method_get_frame_duration) for details.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SpriteFrames_method_clear"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **clear**\ (\ anim\: [StringName](StringName.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#SpriteFrames_method_clear)

Removes all frames from the `anim` animation.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SpriteFrames_method_clear_all"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **clear_all**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#SpriteFrames_method_clear_all)

Removes all animations. An empty ``default`` animation will be created.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SpriteFrames_method_create_from_image_frames"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[SpriteFrames](SpriteFrames.md) **create_from_image_frames**\ (\ image_frames\: [ImageFrames](ImageFrames.md)\ ) <span class="static">static</span> [ðŸ”—](#SpriteFrames_method_create_from_image_frames)

Creates new a **SpriteFrames** object and initializes it by allocating and setting the "default" animation from an [ImageFrames](ImageFrames.md).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SpriteFrames_method_duplicate_animation"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **duplicate_animation**\ (\ anim_from\: [StringName](StringName.md), anim_to\: [StringName](StringName.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#SpriteFrames_method_duplicate_animation)

Duplicates the animation `anim_from` to a new animation named `anim_to`. Fails if `anim_to` already exists, or if `anim_from` does not exist.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SpriteFrames_method_get_animation_loop"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **get_animation_loop**\ (\ anim\: [StringName](StringName.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#SpriteFrames_method_get_animation_loop)

Returns ``true`` if the given animation is configured to loop when it finishes playing. Otherwise, returns ``false``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SpriteFrames_method_get_animation_names"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[PackedStringArray](PackedStringArray.md) **get_animation_names**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#SpriteFrames_method_get_animation_names)

Returns an array containing the names associated to each animation. Values are placed in alphabetical order.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SpriteFrames_method_get_animation_speed"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[float](float.md) **get_animation_speed**\ (\ anim\: [StringName](StringName.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#SpriteFrames_method_get_animation_speed)

Returns the speed in frames per second for the `anim` animation.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SpriteFrames_method_get_frame_count"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](int.md) **get_frame_count**\ (\ anim\: [StringName](StringName.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#SpriteFrames_method_get_frame_count)

Returns the number of frames for the `anim` animation.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SpriteFrames_method_get_frame_duration"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[float](float.md) **get_frame_duration**\ (\ anim\: [StringName](StringName.md), idx\: [int](int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#SpriteFrames_method_get_frame_duration)

Returns a relative duration of the frame `idx` in the `anim` animation (defaults to ``1.0``). For example, a frame with a duration of ``2.0`` is displayed twice as long as a frame with a duration of ``1.0``. You can calculate the absolute duration (in seconds) of a frame using the following formula:

```
    absolute_duration = relative_duration / (animation_fps * abs(playing_speed))
```


In this example, ``playing_speed`` refers to either [AnimatedSprite2D.get_playing_speed()](AnimatedSprite2D.md#AnimatedSprite2D_method_get_playing_speed) or [AnimatedSprite3D.get_playing_speed()](AnimatedSprite3D.md#AnimatedSprite3D_method_get_playing_speed).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SpriteFrames_method_get_frame_texture"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Texture2D](Texture2D.md) **get_frame_texture**\ (\ anim\: [StringName](StringName.md), idx\: [int](int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#SpriteFrames_method_get_frame_texture)

Returns the texture of the frame `idx` in the `anim` animation.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SpriteFrames_method_has_animation"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **has_animation**\ (\ anim\: [StringName](StringName.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#SpriteFrames_method_has_animation)

Returns ``true`` if the `anim` animation exists.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SpriteFrames_method_make_image_frames"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[ImageFrames](ImageFrames.md) **make_image_frames**\ (\ anim\: [StringName](StringName.md) = &"default"\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#SpriteFrames_method_make_image_frames)

Creates a new [ImageFrames](ImageFrames.md) object from contents in the `anim` animation.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SpriteFrames_method_remove_animation"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **remove_animation**\ (\ anim\: [StringName](StringName.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#SpriteFrames_method_remove_animation)

Removes the `anim` animation.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SpriteFrames_method_remove_frame"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **remove_frame**\ (\ anim\: [StringName](StringName.md), idx\: [int](int.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#SpriteFrames_method_remove_frame)

Removes the `anim` animation's frame `idx`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SpriteFrames_method_rename_animation"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **rename_animation**\ (\ anim\: [StringName](StringName.md), newname\: [StringName](StringName.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#SpriteFrames_method_rename_animation)

Changes the `anim` animation's name to `newname`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SpriteFrames_method_set_animation_loop"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_animation_loop**\ (\ anim\: [StringName](StringName.md), loop\: [bool](bool.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#SpriteFrames_method_set_animation_loop)

If `loop` is ``true``, the `anim` animation will loop when it reaches the end, or the start if it is played in reverse.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SpriteFrames_method_set_animation_speed"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_animation_speed**\ (\ anim\: [StringName](StringName.md), fps\: [float](float.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#SpriteFrames_method_set_animation_speed)

Sets the speed for the `anim` animation in frames per second.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SpriteFrames_method_set_frame"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_frame**\ (\ anim\: [StringName](StringName.md), idx\: [int](int.md), texture\: [Texture2D](Texture2D.md), duration\: [float](float.md) = 1.0\ ) [ðŸ”—](#SpriteFrames_method_set_frame)

Sets the `texture` and the `duration` of the frame `idx` in the `anim` animation. `duration` specifies the relative duration, see [get_frame_duration()](SpriteFrames.md#SpriteFrames_method_get_frame_duration) for details.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SpriteFrames_method_set_from_image_frames"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_from_image_frames**\ (\ image_frames\: [ImageFrames](ImageFrames.md), anim\: [StringName](StringName.md) = &"default"\ ) [ðŸ”—](#SpriteFrames_method_set_from_image_frames)

Replaces the animations's data with a new [ImageFrames](ImageFrames.md) for the `anim` animation.
